settings.heading: Frequently Asked Questions

settings.text: Discover the answers to your frequently asked questions about our products and services.

settings.heading: What are Terra Dishwashing Wipes for?
settings.content: Terra Dishwashing Wipes clean utensils, plates, and cookware when water is unavailable. They remove grease and food residue, making them ideal for outdoor trips.

settings.heading: Are Terra After Sun Wipes safe for skin?
settings.content: Yes, Terra After Sun Wipes soothe sun-exposed skin with gentle, cooling ingredients, providing quick comfort after outdoor activities.

settings.heading: What do Terra Camping Wipes clean?
settings.content: Terra Camping Wipes offer full-body freshening and surface cleaning during camping, hiking, and travel. They provide fast, waterless hygiene outdoors.

settings.heading: Do Terra Fruit Cleaning Wipes clean produce safely?
settings.content: Terra Fruit Cleaning Wipes remove dirt, wax, and surface contaminants from fruits and vegetables, making them safer to consume outdoors.

settings.heading: Are Terra Insect Wipes effective?
settings.content: Terra Insect Wipes help remove bugs, insect residue, and dirt from the skin after outdoor exposure, keeping it clean and refreshed.

settings.heading: Can Terra Antibacterial Wipes be used on hands?
settings.content: Yes, Terra Antibacterial Wipes are suitable for cleaning hands and high-touch surfaces, offering fast antibacterial protection outdoors.

settings.heading: What is included in the Terra Freedom Set?
settings.content: The Terra Freedom Set bundles essential outdoor wipes for cleaning, soothing, and sanitising, offering all-in-one convenience for travel and adventure.

settings.heading: Are Terra outdoor wipes travel-friendly?
settings.content: Yes, Terra outdoor wipes come in compact 30-sheet packs that fit easily into backpacks and travel kits.

settings.heading: Are Terra outdoor wipes safe for sensitive skin?
settings.content: Most Terra outdoor wipes are formulated with mild ingredients suitable for adults and children. Always review individual product details for skin compatibility.

settings.heading: Do Terra outdoor wipes leave residue?
settings.content: No, Terra outdoor wipes are designed to clean effectively without leaving sticky or irritating residue on skin or surfaces.

settings.subheading_faq: Discover the answers to your frequently asked questions about Terra products and services.

settings.heading: Is Terra Wipes suitable for all skin types, including sensitive, acne-prone, or eczema-prone skin?
settings.content: Yes. Terra Wipes are dermatologically tested and made with gentle, plant-based ingredients. They are free from alcohol, parabens and harsh chemicals, making them safe for all types of skin, including sensitive and eczema-prone skin.

settings.heading: How often can I safely use Terra Wipes?
settings.content: Terra Wipes are designed for daily use and can be used multiple times per day whenever needed. Their natural, skin-friendly formulation ensures they remain gentle even with frequent use.

settings.heading: What is the correct way to use Terra Wipes?
settings.content: Gently remove a wipe from the pack and apply it directly to your skin. Avoid contact with the eyes, and do not use on broken or severely irritated skin. Once used, dispose of the wipe responsibly, do not flush.

settings.heading: How will my Terra Wipes order be delivered?
settings.content: Every Terra Wipes order is packed securely in eco-conscious packaging and shipped promptly to preserve freshness and ensure safe delivery.

settings.heading: Are Terra Wipes cruelty-free?
settings.content: Yes. All Terra products, including our wipes, are 100% cruelty-free and never tested on animals.

settings.heading: What is the shelf life of Terra Wipes, and how should they be stored?
settings.content: Terra Wipes have a shelf life of 24 months from the date of manufacture. To keep them fresh, store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight, and reseal the pack tightly after each use.

settings.heading: Do Terra Wipes contain any common allergens?
settings.content: Terra Wipes are carefully formulated to be free from common irritants such as alcohol, parabens, fragrances, and chlorine. However, we always recommend checking the ingredient list if you have specific allergies or sensitivities.
